blogPost.excerpt: Charge Running is a mobile app that provides live running classes with others from all over the world! Trainers will update you on your stats and interact with you and your fellow runners in our real-time chat room.
blogPost.body: Charge Running is a mobile app that provides live running classes with others from all over the world! Trainers will update you on your stats and interact with you and your fellow runners in our real-time chat room.
blogPost.title: Charge Running - Social running app with real-time coaching
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Charge Running是一款手机应用，它提供了与来自世界各地的其他人的实时跑步课程! 培训师会在我们的实时聊天室里更新你的数据，并与你和你的跑友互动。
localize.tagline: 实时指导的社交跑步应用

localize.description: Charge Running是一款手機應用，它提供了與來自世界各地的其他人的實時跑步課程! 培訓師會在我們的實時聊天室裏更新你的數據，並與你和你的跑友互動。
localize.tagline: 實時指導的社交跑步應用

previous.excerpt: Live stock prices right in your macOS Dock. Updates every minute. Start with: AAPL, AMC, AMZN, FB, GC=F, GME, GOOG, NKE, MSFT, NFLIX, TSLA, TWTR, more coming soon
previous.title: StockDock - Live stock prices right in your macOS Dock

localize.description: 实时股票价格就在你的macOS Dock中。每分钟更新一次。从以下几个方面开始。AAPL, AMC, AMZN, FB, GC=F, GME, GOOG, NKE, MSFT, NFLIX, TSLA, TWTR, 更多内容即将推出。
localize.tagline: 实时股票价格就在您的macOS Dock中。

localize.description: 實時股票價格就在你的macOS Dock中。每分鐘更新一次。從以下幾個方面開始。AAPL, AMC, AMZN, FB, GC=F, GME, GOOG, NKE, MSFT, NFLIX, TSLA, TWTR, 更多內容即將推出。
localize.tagline: 實時股票價格就在您的macOS Dock中。

next.excerpt: If thinking about money gives you a headache, you're in the right place. Worth it is here to make it as simple as possible, simply list your assets balances (💰, 🚗, 🏠,.) and update it at your own pace. Download it for iOS and Android today!
next.title: Worth it - Keeping track of your money, the simple way

localize.description: 如果一想到钱就头疼，那你就来对地方了。Worth it在这里让它变得尽可能简单，只需列出你的资产余额（💰，🚗，🏠，.），并按自己的节奏更新。今天就下载iOS和Android版吧
localize.tagline: 追踪你的钱，简单的方法

localize.description: 如果一想到錢就頭疼，那你就來對地方了。Worth it在這裏讓它變得儘可能簡單，只需列出你的資產餘額（💰，🚗，🏠，.），並按自己的節奏更新。今天就下載iOS和Android版吧
localize.tagline: 追蹤你的錢，簡單的方法
